title: Best of The Herd: 08/07/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/07/2018
description:
Colin discusses Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James' interests outside of basketball, why the New York Giants are dragging their feet on WR Odell Beckham Jr., and why he feels the Dallas Cowboys problems don't include QB Dak Prescott. Also NBC Sports' Peter King stops by The Herd to talk about the NFL's top stories. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
